Subject: [Bank Aladin] Email Alert not Received by Customer from Endpoint Protector Server
Description:
Hi Support,

Our customer is not receiving email alerts from their Endpoint Protector Server for the Device Control and Content Aware Report since 25/01/2025.

We have verified that there are no configuration changes in the SMTP settings and Alert configuration that previously worked. Additionally, we conducted a manual test by sending an email from the EPP server  E-mail setting to the customer's admin, and the test email was successfully received.

Given the customer's concern regarding this issue, could we schedule a remote session on Monday, 10 February, at 2 PM Indonesia time to further investigate?

Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
What_We_Know__c:
SMTP settings are fine. (Test email is going through)
Email alerts are not sent
Next_Steps__c: Will gain access to the hosted machine and cleanup the Email spool.
Solution_Comment__c: The customer confirmed they received the alert. We can close this ticket.
